metrics.totalVisitorsDesc: Total unique visitors to your site during the selected period.
metrics.avgSessionTimeDesc: Average time users spend on your site, indicating engagement level.
metrics.bounceRateDesc: Percentage of visitors who left after viewing only one page.
metrics.avgVisitorsDesc: Average number of visitors within the selected period.

connect.fileMode: All features like login and payments work as expected.
connect.urlMode: Some features may not work properly.
connect.howToConnect: How would you like to connect
connect.startCollecting: Start the fastest and most accurate data collection.
connect.congratulations: Congratulations! All data accessed through the link above
connect.dataCollected: will be collected in real-time by ARTIFY Intelligence.
connect.dragDropZip: Drag and drop ZIP file here
connect.clickToSelect: Or click to select from your computer (max 50MB)
connect.indexValid: Static site structure is valid and ready for optimization.
connect.whichMethod: Which method is right for me?

overview.trafficFlow: Traffic sources, pages & devices at a glance

goals.bounceRateNote: * For bounce rate, the goal is to stay below the target value.

performance.excellentDesc: Over 95% of users experience a smooth environment.
performance.needsImprovementDesc: Optimization of some items is recommended.
performance.externalSiteDesc: This project was imported from a URL and is hosted externally. Performance data is collected from actual site visitors' browsers.

auth.googleStartSimple: Get started easily with your Google account
auth.termsAgreement: By continuing, you agree to ARTIFY's

billing.currentPlan: You are currently on the {{plan}} plan.
billing.unlockFeatures: Unlock higher limits and advanced analytics features as your business grows.
billing.canChangePlan: Can I change my plan anytime?
billing.canChangePlanAnswer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. When upgrading mid-cycle, you'll be charged pro-rata for the days used.
billing.overLimit: What happens if I exceed my limit?
billing.overLimitAnswer: Data collection won't stop immediately. We'll notify you before reaching the limit and give you time to upgrade before any restrictions apply.
billing.newLimitApplied: Your new request limit is now active. Enjoy all the powerful features of ARTIFY Intelligence Suite.
billing.paymentNotProcessed: Payment was not processed. Please contact support if you experienced any issues.

free.description: Perfect start for personal projects and learning

pro.description: Industry standard choice for growing businesses

enterprise.description: Solution for organizations requiring high traffic and security

dashboard.selectProjectDesc: Select a project to analyze or add a new project to start website analytics.
dashboard.deleteProjectConfirm:
Delete project "{{name}}"?
This action cannot be undone.

behavior.selectPageToAnalyze: the page traffic list to analyze
behavior.clickDataWillShow: Click data will appear here when collected

tips.goalAchieved: You've achieved your {{name}} goal! Consider raising your target.
tips.goalAlmost: You're almost at your {{name}} goal. Keep it up!
tips.seoTip: Increase visitor traffic with SEO optimization and social media promotion.
tips.stayTimeTip: Session time is below target. Review your content quality.
tips.highBounceRate: High bounce rate detected. Landing page improvement needed.
tips.lowBounceRate: Low bounce rate indicates good user engagement.
tips.ctaTip: Try A/B testing CTA button positions and designs.
tips.setGoalTip: Set goals to systematically manage your site's performance.

redeploy.title: Redeploy Project
redeploy.description: Upload a new ZIP file to update

overview.noData: No visitor data collected yet. Please verify the tracking script is properly installed.
overview.increasing: {{period}} traffic is up {{percent}}%. Total {{visits}} visits with {{bounceRate}}% avg bounce rate and {{stayTime}}s avg session time.
overview.decreasing: {{period}} traffic is down {{percent}}%. Total {{visits}} visits, {{bounceRate}}% avg bounce rate, {{stayTime}}s avg session time. Review your traffic sources.
overview.stable: {{period}} traffic is stable. Total {{visits}} visits with {{bounceRate}}% avg bounce rate and {{stayTime}}s avg session time.

correlations.visitorBouncePositive: Higher visitor count correlates with higher bounce rate (r={{coefficient}}). Review traffic quality.
correlations.visitorBounceNegative: Despite visitor increase, bounce rate decreases - a positive pattern (r={{coefficient}}).
correlations.visitorStayPositive: Visitor count and session time increase together - a healthy pattern (r={{coefficient}}).
correlations.visitorStayNegative: Session time decreases as visitors increase. Review content quality (r={{coefficient}}).
correlations.analyzingCorrelation: Analyzing data to find meaningful correlations.
correlations.stayBounceNegative: Longer session time correlates with lower bounce rate (r={{coefficient}}). Content quality is good.
correlations.stayBouncePositive: High bounce rate despite long session time - unusual pattern. Analyze user intent.
correlations.visitStayPositive: Visitor increase correlates with longer session time - a positive pattern.
correlations.visitStayNegative: Session time decreases with more visitors. Review traffic quality.
correlations.needMoreData: More data needed for behavioral pattern analysis.
correlations.inflowDeclining: Traffic efficiency is declining. Review channels.
correlations.deviceAnalysis: Analyzing visit ratio and conversion rate by device.
correlations.visitConversionPositive: Visitor increase and conversion increase correlate - a healthy pattern (r={{coefficient}}).
correlations.visitConversionNegative: Conversions don't follow visitor increase. Optimize conversion paths.
correlations.conversionNeedData: More data needed for conversion pattern analysis.
correlations.lcpBounceRate: Each 1s improvement in load time is known to reduce bounce rate by ~4%.

recommendations.highBounceRate: Bounce rate exceeds 60%. Improve landing page first impression and load speed.
recommendations.lowStayTime: Avg session time is under 1 minute. Improve content readability and appeal.
recommendations.trafficDecreasing: Traffic is declining. Review marketing channel performance and reallocate budget.
recommendations.goodMetrics: Current metrics are healthy. Continue monitoring to maintain performance.
recommendations.setKPI: Set key KPI targets and track achievement rates.
recommendations.abTest: Run regular A/B tests to find conversion optimization opportunities.
recommendations.highBounce: High bounce rate. Improve landing page content and CTAs.
recommendations.shortStayTime: Short session time. Add related content recommendations.
recommendations.heatmapAnalysis: Analyze heatmaps and session recordings to identify UX bottlenecks.
recommendations.userFeedback: Collect user feedback to discover improvement opportunities.
recommendations.utmTracking: Use UTM parameters to precisely track campaign performance.
recommendations.focusBudget: Focus marketing budget on high-converting channels.
recommendations.seoOptimize: Increase organic traffic through SEO optimization.
recommendations.mobileFirst: Optimize responsive design with mobile-first strategy.
recommendations.browserTest: Regularly test rendering across major browsers.
recommendations.lightweightOption: Consider lightweight options for low-spec device users.
recommendations.simplifyProcess: Simplify checkout/signup process to 3 steps or fewer.
recommendations.reminderEmail: Send reminder emails to cart/form abandoners.
recommendations.ctaAbTest: A/B test CTA button copy and colors.
recommendations.optimizeImages: Optimize images (WebP, lazy loading) to improve LCP.
recommendations.codeSplitting: Split JavaScript bundles to reduce initial load time.
recommendations.fixedSizes: Set fixed sizes for images and ads to prevent CLS.

behavior.collecting: Collecting user behavior data. Detailed analysis will be available once sufficient data is gathered.
behavior.summary: Average session time is {{stayTime}}s with {{bounceRate}}% bounce rate.
behavior.highBounce: Bounce rate is high. Review main landing pages.
behavior.goodEngagement: Bounce rate is acceptable with good user engagement.

acquisition.noData: No traffic data collected. Start marketing campaigns or verify UTM parameters.
acquisition.increasing: {{period}} traffic is up {{percent}}%. Current marketing strategy is working effectively.
acquisition.decreasing: {{period}} traffic is down {{percent}}%. Analyze channel performance and reallocate budget.
acquisition.stable: {{period}} traffic is stable. Total {{visits}} visits recorded.

tech.analyzing: Analyzing technology environment data. Discover optimization opportunities through device and browser analysis.
tech.collecting: Collecting technology environment data. Analysis will begin once sufficient samples are gathered.

conversion.collecting: Collecting conversion data. Set up conversion events and define goals.
conversion.decreasing: Conversions are down {{percent}}%. Check funnel analysis to identify drop-off points.

performanceTab.summary: Monitor Core Web Vitals. Target: LCP < 2.5s, FID < 100ms, CLS < 0.1.

default.summary: Analyzing data. More accurate insights will be provided once sufficient data is collected.
default.monitoring: Continuously collect data to obtain precise insights.
default.trackChanges: Monitor key metrics regularly for changes.
default.setAndTrack: Set goals and track achievement rates.
